name: Thunderstrike - Jupiter
text: If a "Thunderstrike" monster is Special Summoned to your side of the field: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned: You can banish any number of Thunder monsters from your GY; Special Summon 1 Thunder Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck with a Level equal to the total levels of the monsters that were banished, and if you do, return this card to the hand. You can only activate each effect of "Thunderstrike Jupiter" once per turn.
